name: ELBA - coarse-grained and hybrid simulations
tagline: Blogging and tutorials on how to setup, run and analyse simulations with the Elba and Elba/AA force fields
body:
### Welcome

This is supposed to be a blog and a collection of tutorials on how to setup, run and analyse simulations with the Elba coarse-grained and Elba/AA hybrid force fields.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
